tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: Select userSessionId as "Sessions",duration/100 as "Duration (s)",usersession.stringProperties.tailnumber as "${property2.id}",useractioncount as "Action Count",numberOfRageClicks as "Rage Cnt",(duration / userActionCount) as "Engagement Rate", (numberOfRageClicks*100/useractioncount) as "Rage Rate", (totalErrorCount*100/useractioncount) as "Error Rate" FROM usersession where ${journey.where-4} ${uspClause} ${property.usqland} IS NOT NULL order by duration desc

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct DATETIME(starttime,"yyy-MM-dd HH:mm","5m") as "Start Time",${property2.usql},CONDITION(avg(visuallyCompleteTime), where ${property.usql} IS NOT NULL) as "Visually Complete" FROM useraction where ${journey.where-4}  ${uspClause} ${property.usqland} IS NOT NULL

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct top(${property2.usql},10),CONDITION(count(${property2.usql}), where ${property.usql} IS NOT NULL) as "Count" FROM useraction where ${journey.where-4}  ${uspClause} ${property.usqland} IS NOT NULL

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct DATETIME(starttime,"yyy-MM-dd HH:mm","5m") as "Start Time",${property2.usql},CONDITION(count(usersession.totalErrorCount), where ${property.usql} IS NOT NULL) as "Count" FROM useraction where ${journey.where-4}  ${uspClause} ${property.usqland} IS NOT NULL

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct top(${property2.usql},10),CONDITION(COUNT(*), where ${property.usql} IS NOT NULL and isExitAction=true) as "Count" FROM useraction where ${journey.where-4}  ${uspClause} ${property.usqland} IS NOT NULL
